#!/bin/bash

# --- 1. Install System Dependencies ---
sudo apt update -y
sudo apt install -y git ffmpeg
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_22.x | sudo -E bash -
sudo apt install -y nodejs

# Install Chromium shared libraries for Puppeteer
sudo apt-get install -y libatk-bridge2.0-0 libgtk-3-0 libappindicator3-1 libnss3 libxss1 libasound2 libgbm1 libx11-xcb1 libxcomposite1 libxkbcommon0

# --- 2. Clone the Repository and Switch Branch ---
cd /home/ubuntu
git clone --branch 43-join-zoom-meetings-from-ec2 https://github.com/BinaryStudioAcademy/bsa-2025-meetlytic.git

# --- 3. Install NPM Dependencies & Puppeteer Browser ---
cd bsa-2025-meetlytic
/usr/bin/npm install
/usr/bin/npx puppeteer browsers install chrome

# --- 4. Configure and Run the Bot ---
cd apps/bot

echo "NODE_ENV=production" > .env
echo "MEETING_ID=${MeetingId}" >> .env
echo "MEETING_PASSWORD=${ZoomPassword}" >> .env
echo "BOT_NAME=Meetlytic" >> .env

ohhup /usr/bin/npm run start:dev > /home/ubuntu/bot.log 2>&1 &
